author: Kanishka
content: I am sorry but one star is only for the hospitality of the owner. The food is not at all what I would go for. It has no flavour and quality. Rice used is of bad quality with no aroma and the chicken has beetroot in it for no good reason. Sabzi and daal doesnâ€™t have any depth of flavour as opposed to what Indian cuisine and style of preparation is all about.
